languages.text: "Я бы лучше сам потолковал с ним. Сердце подсказывает, что лишь он знает, как и во имя чего погибла стая Зловещий вой. И оно же, мое злое и мстительное сердце, говорит, что я не прощу себе, если надутый говнюк Калькасар по какой-то причине сдохнет прежде, чем я вырву ответы на свои вопросы из его уст".

"I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
languages.original_text: "Я бы лучше сам потолковал с ним. Сердце подсказывает, что лишь он знает, как и во имя чего погибла стая Зловещий вой. И оно же, мое злое и мстительное сердце, говорит, что я не прощу себе, если надутый говнюк Калькасар по какой-то причине сдохнет прежде, чем я вырву ответы на свои вопросы из его уст".

traits.locale_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Famehungry pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if Calcazar the Shitheel somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Famehungry pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if Calcazar the Shitheel somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我更希望能亲口和他谈谈。我的心充满了愤怒与仇恨，它告诉我，只有那个混蛋知道怒嚎者狼群是怎么死的，为什么会死。它还告诉我，如果卡尔卡扎那个狂妄的王八蛋死了，而我却没能撕开他流着口水的嘴，从他喉咙里掏出答案，那我绝对不能原谅我自己。”
languages.original_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."

traits.locale_text: “我更希望能亲口和他谈谈。我的心充满了愤怒与仇恨，它告诉我，只有那个混蛋知道渴名者狼群是怎么死的，为什么会死。它还告诉我，如果卡尔卡扎那个狂妄的王八蛋死了，而我却没能撕开他流着口水的嘴，从他喉咙里掏出答案，那我绝对不能原谅我自己。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Preferiría hablar con él personalmente. Mi corazón furioso y vengativo me dice que es la única persona que sabe cómo y por qué murió la jauría del Aullido Torvo. También me dice que no podré perdonarme si ese engreído malnacido de Calcazar muere antes de que arranque las respuestas de su boca taimada».
languages.original_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."

traits.locale_text: «Preferiría hablar con él personalmente. Mi corazón furioso y vengativo me dice que es la única persona que sabe cómo y por qué murió la jauría del Aullido Torvo. También me dice que no podré perdonarme si ese engreído malnacido de Calcazar muere antes de que arranque las respuestas de su boca taimada».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「むしろ、自分で奴と話がしたい。俺の怒りと復讐心が、破滅の咆哮の群れがなぜ、どのように死んだのかを知っているのは奴だけだと告げているんだ。そのうえ、思い上がりくそ野郎のカルカサルの口から答えを吐かせる前に奴がくたばっちまったら、俺は自分自身を許すこともできねえと言っている」
languages.original_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."

traits.locale_text: 「むしろ、自分で奴と話がしたい。俺の怒りと復讐心が、破滅の咆哮の群れがなぜ、どのように死んだのかを知っているのは奴だけだと告げているんだ。そのうえ、思い上がりくそ野郎のカルカサルの口から答えを吐かせる前に奴がくたばっちまったら、俺は自分自身を許すこともできねえと言っている」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich möchte lieber selbst mit ihm sprechen. Mein zorniges und rachsüchtiges Herz sagt mir, dass nur er weiß, wie und warum das Baleful-Howl-Rudel gestorben ist. Es sagt mir auch, dass ich es mir nie vergeben würde, wenn dieses aufgeblasene Arschloch Calcazar irgendwie stirbt, bevor ich ihm die Antwort aus seinem grinsenden Maul reiße."
languages.original_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte lieber selbst mit ihm sprechen. Mein zorniges und rachsüchtiges Herz sagt mir, dass nur er weiß, wie und warum das Baleful-Howl-Rudel gestorben ist. Es sagt mir auch, dass ich es mir nie vergeben würde, wenn dieses aufgeblasene Arschloch Calcazar irgendwie stirbt, bevor ich ihm die Antwort aus seinem grinsenden Maul reiße."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je préfère lui parler moi-même. Mon cœur furieux et assoiffé de vengeance me dit que lui seul sait comment et pourquoi les Hurleurs sanguinaires ont disparu. Il me souffle également que je ne me le pardonnerais pas si cet arriviste mourait avant que j'aie eu le temps de lui arracher des réponses. »
languages.original_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère lui parler moi-même. Mon cœur furieux et assoiffé de vengeance me dit que lui seul sait comment et pourquoi les Hurleurs sanguinaires ont disparu. Il me souffle également que je ne me le pardonnerais pas si cet arriviste mourait avant que j'aie eu le temps de lui arracher des réponses. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Onunla kendim konuşmayı yeğlerim. Öfkeli ve kin dolu yüreğim bana Uğursuz Uluma sürüsünün neden ve nasıl öldüğünü yalnızca onun bildiğini söylüyor. Bana ayrıca Calcazar denen kendini beğenmiş göt bir şekilde ben onun iğrenç ağzından aradığım yanıtları söküp alamadan ölürse kendimi asla affetmeyeceğimi de söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "I would rather talk to him myself. My angry and vengeful heart tells me that only he knows how and why the Baleful Howl pack died. It also tells me that I will not forgive myself if that puffed-up arsehole Calcazar somehow dies before I rip the answers from his leering mouth."
